languages.text: "Каждый на судне почему-то считает элантах неразумным дитя. Если ты и правда ценишь {mf|его|ее}, то признай, что {mf|он|она} сам{mf||а} творит свой путь".
"For some reason, everyone on the ship sees the elantach as an unreasonable child. If you truly esteem {mf|him|her}, then recognise that {mf|he|she} can forge {mf|his|her} own path."
languages.original_text: "Каждый на судне почему-то считает элантах неразумным дитя. Если ты и правда ценишь {mf|его|ее}, то признай, что {mf|он|она} сам{mf||а} творит свой путь".

traits.locale_text: "For some reason, everyone on the ship sees the elantach as an unreasonable child. If you truly esteem {mf|him|her}, then recognise that {mf|he|she} can forge {mf|his|her} own path."
"For some reason, everyone on the ship sees the elantach as an unreasonable child. If you truly esteem {mf|him|her}, then recognise that {mf|he|she} can forge {mf|his|her} own path."
"For some reason, everyone on the ship sees the elantach as an unreasonable child. If you truly esteem {mf|him|her}, then recognise that {mf|he|she} can forge {mf|his|her} own path."
"For some reason, everyone on the ship sees the elantach as an unreasonable child. If you truly esteem {mf|him|her}, then recognise that {mf|he|she} can forge {mf|his|her} own path."
"For some reason, everyone on the ship sees the elantach as an unreasonable child. If you truly esteem {mf|him|her}, then recognise that {mf|he|she} can forge {mf|his|her} own path."

languages.text: "Aus irgendeinem Grund sehen alle auf dem Schiff, {mf|den|die} Elantach als unvernünftiges Kind. Wenn Ihr {mf|ihn|sie} wirklich schätzt, dann erkennt an, dass {mf|er|sie} {mf|seinen|ihren} eigenen Pfad bestimmten kann."
languages.original_text: "For some reason, everyone on the ship sees the elantach as an unreasonable child. If you truly esteem {mf|him|her}, then recognise that {mf|he|she} can forge {mf|his|her} own path."

traits.locale_text: "Aus irgendeinem Grund sehen alle auf dem Schiff, {mf|den|die} Elantach als unvernünftiges Kind. Wenn Ihr {mf|ihn|sie} wirklich schätzt, dann erkennt an, dass {mf|er|sie} {mf|seinen|ihren} eigenen Pfad bestimmten kann."

languages.text: « Pour une raison quelconque, tout le monde à bord voit l'elantach comme {mf|un|une} enfant déraisonnable. Si vous avez vraiment de l'estime pour {mf|lui|elle}, reconnaissez qu'{mf|il|elle} est tout à fait capable de tracer {mf|lui-même|elle-même} sa propre voie. »
languages.original_text: "For some reason, everyone on the ship sees the elantach as an unreasonable child. If you truly esteem {mf|him|her}, then recognise that {mf|he|she} can forge {mf|his|her} own path."

traits.locale_text: « Pour une raison quelconque, tout le monde à bord voit l'elantach comme {mf|un|une} enfant déraisonnable. Si vous avez vraiment de l'estime pour {mf|lui|elle}, reconnaissez qu'{mf|il|elle} est tout à fait capable de tracer {mf|lui-même|elle-même} sa propre voie. »

languages.text: «Por alguna razón, todos en esta nave ven a{mf|l| la} elantach como un{mf||a} niñ{mf|o|a} irracional. Si de verdad l{mf|o|a} estimas, admite que es capaz de labrarse su propia senda».
languages.original_text: "For some reason, everyone on the ship sees the elantach as an unreasonable child. If you truly esteem {mf|him|her}, then recognise that {mf|he|she} can forge {mf|his|her} own path."

traits.locale_text: «Por alguna razón, todos en esta nave ven a{mf|l| la} elantach como un{mf||a} niñ{mf|o|a} irracional. Si de verdad l{mf|o|a} estimas, admite que es capaz de labrarse su propia senda».

languages.text: 「なぜか、船の全員がエランタを聞き分けの悪い子供だと思っている。もし本当に{mf|彼|彼女}を尊敬しているのなら、{mf|彼|彼女}が自身の道を切り開くことができるんだと自覚するべきよ」
languages.original_text: "For some reason, everyone on the ship sees the elantach as an unreasonable child. If you truly esteem {mf|him|her}, then recognise that {mf|he|she} can forge {mf|his|her} own path."

traits.locale_text: 「なぜか、船の全員がエランタを聞き分けの悪い子供だと思っている。もし本当に{mf|彼|彼女}を尊敬しているのなら、{mf|彼|彼女}が自身の道を切り開くことができるんだと自覚するべきよ」

languages.text: “不知为什么，这艘船上的每个人都把外界人当做不讲道理的孩子。如果你真的尊重{mf|他|她}，那你必须承认，{mf|他|她}有能力开辟属于{mf|他|她}自己的道路。”
languages.original_text: "For some reason, everyone on the ship sees the elantach as an unreasonable child. If you truly esteem {mf|him|her}, then recognise that {mf|he|she} can forge {mf|his|her} own path."

traits.locale_text: “不知为什么，这艘船上的每个人都把外界人当做不讲道理的孩子。如果你真的尊重{mf|他|她}，那你必须承认，{mf|他|她}有能力开辟属于{mf|他|她}自己的道路。”

languages.original_text: "For some reason, everyone on the ship sees the elantach as an unreasonable child. If you truly esteem {mf|him|her}, then recognise that {mf|he|she} can forge {mf|his|her} own path."

languages.text: "Neden bilmiyorum ama bu gemideki herkes, elantach'ı mantık bilmeyen bir çocuk gibi görüyor. Eğer ki ona hakikaten hürmet duyuyorsanız kendi yolunu çizebileceğini kabul edin."
languages.original_text: "For some reason, everyone on the ship sees the elantach as an unreasonable child. If you truly esteem {mf|him|her}, then recognise that {mf|he|she} can forge {mf|his|her} own path."
